content: अवकॢप् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To correspond with, to answer. {@--2@} To be right or fit, to be possible; इतश्च न प्रधानस्य प्रवृत्तिरवकल्पते <ls>Ś. B.</ls> {@--3@} To help to, to serve, to accomplish, result in (with <ab>dat.</ab>); शरीरिणां संसृतयेऽवकल्पते <ls>Bhāg.</ls> {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To put in order, to prepare; to make ready; संभारानवकल्पय <ls>Mb.</ls> {@--2@} To use or employ becomingly. {@--3@} To consider as possible; नावकल्प्यमिदंग्लायेद्यत्कृच्छ्रेषु भवानपि <ls>Bk. 19. 17</ls>; यत्तत्रभवान्वृषलं याजयेन्नावकल्पयामि <ls>P. III. 3. 147</ls> <ls>Sk.</ls>
